item.title: My Operating Manuals for Life
item.description: If you accept that you have your own User Interface, youâ€™re going to need some instructions on how to set it up and maintain it. As you know, my go to source for just about everything is books, and I have found those on the list below especially useful for hacking together my own mental operating system. They currently sit right on my desk where I can see them every day and think about what they mean to me.
